question:
Mrs Barrett, an English-speaking woman who lives in your town, has advertised for someone to help her in her home for a few hours a day next summer.
Write a letter to Mrs Barrett. In your letter
suggest how you could help her in her home
say why you would like to do this work
explain when you will and will not be available
text: My name is Arash Shirmo and I am living in Homewood street, right next to your home. I have seen your advertisement for finding someone that can help you at home coming summer.

First of all, please let me introduce myself. I am 16 years old and very active boy. My father has learned me how to deal with technical problems of home and can fix some of the existing technical issues in your house moreover  since our house has a big garden, I am very familiar with garden works and have knowledge of agriculture. Thus you can rest your mind about outdoor tasks besides, I help my mother to do the household duty and I am well experienced in it. I have seen your proposed salary amount in your advertisement. If you accept me and I get this job, not only I buy a new USB Flash for my mobile phone but also I can improve my English speaking skill.
In the summer, I have an English language learning class on Monday and Wednesday therefore not possible for me to be there but for the rest of the week, I will be free to come.
Hope to get this job and hear from you soon.
